b'Kime Koi!': b'Hero Hajime is going to school with Misa and Megumi. He loves Megumi, and asks Misa if there is a way to win Megumi over. Misa produces a pill that is supposed to make the taker reveal their exact feelings for someone. It turns out Megumi has been wanting Hajime, but so has Misa.'
[b'Kime Koi! Takane no Hana to Osananajimi ga Kimatta Riyuu']
